turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I need to order a Starbucks espresso.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, which drink did you want to order from there?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Cappuccino, yeah, okay. Cappuccino, let's get a cappuccino. I'll need it venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, what size did you want?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: there is nonfat and 2% at starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and which starbucks did you want me to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's the one at 2850 International at the Sea-Tac Airport.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, did you need anything else from starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so you want to order a venti cappuccino with 2% milk from starbucks at 2850 international at sea tac airport.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome! the total will be $4.50 for this order. should i process the payment now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, the order has been placed and the drink will be ready at the location you selected in 9 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. Thank you. No, I didn't.
